casebody.data:
Barker III
v.
Bank of New York Mellon et al. A165431 Court of Appeals of Oregon. November 7, 2018

BANK OF NEW YORK MELLON, the, fka the Bank of New York, as Trustee for the Certificateholders of the CWABS, Inc., Asset-Backed Certificates, Series 2006-22
v.
BARKER, III and Barker, IV et al.

Affirmed without opinion.
